title: Facebook Will Now Let You Know If A Government Has Hacked Into Your Account
text:
Facebook Will Now Let You Know If A Government Has Hacked Into Your Account 
BuzzFeed News Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
ID: 7154204 Facebook will alert users to successful attempts by governments to compromise accounts, the social networkâ€™s chief security officer announced in a low-key statement on the website.Alex Stamos...
